question: Which among the following international bodies have established the Poverty Reduction Growth Facility to help the low income countries?
explanation: Poverty Reduction Growth Facility was established as Enhanced Structural Adjustment Facility (ESAF) in 1987 at International Monetary Fund with an amount of SDR 6 billion to help the low income countries with heavy debt burdens in difficult external environment to implement comprehensive macro-economic and structural policy programmes aiming at strengthening their balance of payments position and fostering growth.
